.
Eligibility for Benefits Under PL 107-330 After Remarriage
Under
PL 107-330
, which was effective February 4, 2003, a surviving spouse who remarries upon attaining age 55 retains VA Civilian Health and Medical Program (CHAMPVA) eligibility.
Note
:
PL 107-330
is an exception to the requirement that a surviving spouse must remain unmarried in order to retain eligibility for VA benefits.
